# Diagrams

*Auto-generated for Website feed*

## Available Diagrams

| Diagram | Type | Description |
|---------|------|-------------|
| [Feature Hierarchy](./feature-hierarchy.md) | flowchart | Hierarchical view of all features and user stories |
| [Team Organization](./team-organization.md) | flowchart | Team structure with repository ownership |
| [System Architecture](./system-architecture.md) | flowchart | C4-style system context diagram |
| [Feature Status](./feature-status.md) | pie | Distribution of feature statuses |

## Viewing Diagrams

These diagrams use [Mermaid](https://mermaid.js.org/) syntax and can be viewed:

1. **GitHub/GitLab**: Rendered automatically in markdown files
2. **VS Code**: Install "Mermaid Preview" extension
3. **Docusaurus**: Built-in mermaid support
4. **Online**: Copy to [mermaid.live](https://mermaid.live)
